body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarSecure Solutions. My name is Juan Thomas.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. To assist you further, may I kindly ask for your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is two nine zero four one nine nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also provide me with the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my phone number are seven eight five two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Rebecca. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Rebecca. Have a wonderful day!
